name: Optimized Measurement with DOE: Unified + EFA + TCP (50 patterns)
description: Optimized measurement phase using Design of Experiments (DOE). Reduced from 128 to 50 patterns (62.5% reduction) while maintaining statistical validity. Measurement time: 7-9 hours (down from 16-27 hours).

mlflow_config._comment: Set timestamp_suffix to false to disable timestamp in experiment name. When true, experiment name becomes: nixl-efa-phase2-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS

layers.name: Baseline Measurements
layers.description: Network and GPU baseline measurements to establish theoretical bandwidth limits and verify EFA/GPU health

patterns.description: EFA device verification (fi_info -p efa, ibv_devices)
EFA RDMA bandwidth (provider=efa)
EFA ping-pong latency (provider=efa, sizes=64,1K,64K,1M)
TCP bandwidth baseline (iperf3 -c, P=1,4,8, t=30)
NCCL all_reduce_perf bandwidth (1M-1G, g=4)
GPU info: memory, utilization, driver version
GPU monitoring: clock, temperature, power, P-state during measurement
PCIe topology: GPU-NIC connection, GPUDirect RDMA check

layers.name: Unified Mode (Single Node)
layers.description: TPOT baseline without KV-Cache transfer. Single node Prefill+Decode. No Proxy. Establishes pure GPU compute baseline for TPOT and Prefill-only TTFT baseline.

layers.name: EFA Disaggregated (1K-128K)
layers.description: EFA KV-Cache transfer measurements via Proxy (disagg_proxy_server.py v3). NixlConnector with LIBFABRIC backend, kv_buffer_device=cuda (g6e.12xlarge does not support GPUDirect RDMA but cuda buffer is available).

patterns._comment: Cross-layers KV cache layout (PR #33339). Compare with p2-efa-12k-c1 to measure TTFT improvement from reduced transfer fragmentation.

layers.name: TCP Disaggregated (1K-128K)
layers.description: TCP KV-Cache transfer measurements via Proxy (disagg_proxy_server.py v3). NixlConnector with UCX backend (UCX_TLS=tcp,self,sm), kv_buffer_device=cpu (explicit cudaMemcpy D2H + H2D).

layers.name: Cross-validation and Analysis
layers.description: TPOT separation analysis (GPU compute vs batch wait), bimodality detection in TTFT, and Proxy overhead isolation using toy_proxy_server.py timestamps.

patterns.description: Dip test for bimodal TTFT distribution. Separate Phase A (MR registration cost) from Phase B (steady state).
Proxy internal timestamps to measure request forwarding, response relay overhead. Uses disagg_proxy_server.py v3 with X-Proxy-* headers.
ITL clustering with GMM to separate GPU compute time from batch scheduling wait time at c>=2

layers.name: Low-Level Network and KV-Cache Transfer Measurement
layers.description: Direct measurement of network-level metrics using fi_pingpong, NIXLBench, KVBench, and ucx_perftest. Provides empirical evidence for E2E observations and isolates network layer from vLLM overhead. All sizes calibrated for Qwen2.5-32B (262,144 bytes/token). L5 patterns are for adhoc measurement only. Run these patterns individually when E2E measurements show anomalies.

cross_experiment_comparisons.name: EFA vs TCP at 1K-32K
cross_experiment_comparisons.hypothesis: EFA vs TCP TPOT diff ~8-11ms due to kv_buffer_device (cuda vs cpu). TTFT diff <3ms at 1K-12K.

cross_experiment_comparisons.name: EFA vs TCP at 64K-128K
cross_experiment_comparisons.hypothesis: KV-Cache 16-33GB makes EFA superiority pronounced. TTFT diff 100-500ms at 128K.

cross_experiment_comparisons.name: Unified vs Disaggregated TPOT
cross_experiment_comparisons.hypothesis: unified TPOT ~= EFA TPOT (diff <2ms). TCP TPOT higher due to kv_buffer_device=cpu.

cross_experiment_comparisons.name: Unified vs Disaggregated TTFT (KV-Cache transfer cost)
cross_experiment_comparisons.hypothesis: TTFT diff = KV-Cache transfer + Proxy overhead + NIXL protocol overhead. Linear with prompt length.

cross_experiment_comparisons.name: Baseline bandwidth vs actual KV-Cache transfer
cross_experiment_comparisons.hypothesis: Actual KV-Cache transfer utilizes 30-50% of raw EFA bandwidth due to protocol overhead.

cross_experiment_comparisons.name: TPOT decomposition (GPU compute vs batch wait)
cross_experiment_comparisons.hypothesis: At c>=2, ITL shows bimodal distribution. GPU compute ratio decreases from ~100% (c=1) to ~69% (c=16).

cross_experiment_comparisons.name: NIXLBench EFA vs UCX transfer time
cross_experiment_comparisons.hypothesis: EFA (Libfabric) achieves 3-5x lower transfer time than UCX/TCP for same KV-Cache size due to RDMA zero-copy.

cross_experiment_comparisons.name: NIXLBench direct vs E2E KV-Cache transfer
cross_experiment_comparisons.hypothesis: NIXLBench direct transfer accounts for 60-80% of E2E TTFT overhead. Remaining gap = NIXL protocol + vLLM scheduling + Proxy.

cross_experiment_comparisons.name: ucx_perftest cuda vs host memory bandwidth
cross_experiment_comparisons.hypothesis: CUDA memory achieves higher bandwidth than host memory due to GPUDirect RDMA bypass of CPU. Difference most pronounced at large sizes (100MB+).

cross_experiment_comparisons.name: KVBench profiling vs theoretical KV-Cache transfer time
cross_experiment_comparisons.hypothesis: KVBench measures actual layer-by-layer transfer overhead. Total time exceeds theoretical (size/bandwidth) by 2-5x due to MR registration, protocol overhead.

execution_order.description: Unified mode: all prompts (1K-128K), single vLLM instance with max_model_len=131072
EFA standard context (1K-32K): LIBFABRIC backend, kv_buffer_device=cuda

execution_order.restart_reason: enable_cross_layers_blocks change (false  true): KV-Cache memory layout optimization
execution_order.description: EFA with cross-layers KV cache layout (PR #33339). Compare TTFT with p2-efa-12k-c1 to measure transfer fragmentation reduction effect.

execution_order.restart_reason: transport change (EFA  TCP): kv_buffer_device cudacpu, backend LIBFABRICUCX
execution_order.description: TCP standard context (1K-32K): UCX backend, kv_buffer_device=cpu

execution_order.restart_reason: transport change (TCP  EFA) + max_model_len change (32768  131072) + YaRN activation
execution_order.description: EFA long context (64K-128K): YaRN enabled, max_model_len=131072

execution_order.restart_reason: transport change (EFA  TCP): kv_buffer_device cudacpu, backend LIBFABRICUCX
execution_order.description: TCP long context (64K-128K): YaRN enabled, max_model_len=131072
